original_title: Attack of the Flesh Devouring Space Worms from Space
overview: A rural Arkansas town is besieged by extraterrestrial giant worms who reanimate dead bodies. A group of various individuals barricade themselves inside an old hotel while zombies and worms attack from all sides. Eventually the military is called in to quell the situation.
title: Attack of the Flesh Devouring Space Worms from Space
